headline: Xi Gains Leverage Before Trump Summit After Tariff Reversal
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping is heading to the negotiating table with Donald Trump with a boost in bargaining power, after the US leader lost his ability to quickly raise tariffs for nearly any reason.  Weeks before Trump lands in Beijing on March 31, the first trip by an American president since his last visit in 2017, the Supreme Court invalidated his broad emergency tariffs — a key point of leverage over China.

headline: Boeing (BA) Valuation In Focus After Recent Share Price Swings And Conflicting Fair Value Estimates
summary: Why Boeing Stock Is On Investors' Radar Boeing (BA) has been drawing fresh attention after a period of mixed short term returns, with the share price showing declines over the week and month, but a gain over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Boeing. While Boeing's share price has seen a 4.5% decline over the past week and an 8% decline over 30 days, the 29.5% 90 day share price return and 31% 1 year total shareholder return suggest momentum has recently been rebuilding after...

headline: Assessing Curtiss-Wright (CW) Valuation After Strong Results Guidance And New C-17 Avionics Contract
summary: Why Curtiss-Wright’s latest earnings and guidance matter for investors Curtiss-Wright (CW) has drawn fresh attention after reporting higher fourth quarter and full year 2025 revenue and earnings, issuing 2026 guidance, and landing a long term avionics contract with Boeing for the C-17 program. See our latest analysis for Curtiss-Wright.
